titles.title: A resolution supporting the observation of National Trafficking and Modern Slavery Prevention Month during the period beginning on January 1, 2023, and ending on February 1, 2023, to raise awareness of, and opposition to, human trafficking and modern slavery.

A resolution supporting the observation of National Trafficking and Modern Slavery Prevention Month during the period beginning on January 1, 2023, and ending on February 1, 2023, to raise awareness of, and opposition to, human trafficking and modern slavery.

action.text: Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Yea-Nay. 97 - 0. Record Vote Number: 4.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: This resolution expresses support for observing National Trafficking and Modern Slavery Prevention Month during the period of January 1-February 1, 2023.
